content: lion brand pattern # 60744a corrections applied feb 4 2008 skill level intermediate vanna s choice® article #860 6 balls *shown in honey* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge 1 pattern repeat = 5½ in 14 cm make 2 panels design features picot edging in the last row seam panels together work 3-round edging to finish
